Text.val: Author :Bujakowski Grzegorz
30.05.2013 GB SCR18143 Replaced the string ns11 by the ns... get from <End:ns...:Ntry> - chnaged the mechanism of sorting
23.04.2012 SH SCR17259 BPH306-3 Removed part "Bank reference"
19.04.2012 SH SCR17259 Undo change. "Changed update of NFPA_AMOUNTACCCURR (replaced dot by comma)"; Fixed bug handling payments
and debit/credit flag; Added update NFPA_IBAN; Descriptions from XML now stored in separate NFPC rows (no longer concatenated)
16.04.2012 SH SCR17259 Changed update of NFPA_AMOUNTACCCURR (replaced dot by comma)
14.12.2011 GB SCR16804 Changed call the BPH306-1/2/3 after the concatenation many row the NFPS in one (one part of xml file)
13.12.2011 GB SCR16804 Fixed problem with the part If CdtDbtInd>DBIT (debit) then multiply by -1 (for update the NFPA_AMOUNTACC)
11.12.2011 GB SCR16804 Added the All payments handled in a statement part of the end program
09.12.2011 SH SCR16804 Diff. bugfixes
-- Get the ns number to replaced the string ns11
-- All statements handled
-- Reset error code in case of retry from online program
-- Validate file for errors
-- 1. Header record, 2. Transactions, 3. Descriptions
-- All payments handled in a statement
-- If PO.ERRORCODE > 0 then save the following values in NEW_FILE_PAYMENT_STATEMENT and continuewith the next NFPS row
-- Final error updates (statement level)
-- If statement is OK then BADT, BADP, BDPD rows have to be stored with BPH353
-- Check if data exist
-- NFPS_EXTRACTED_STATEMENTDATE must be not null
-- Check if the tag <ns11:SimpAcct> exists
-- Integrating many line in one (full ns11:Ntry the row)
-- There is 500 because length of NFPC_FILEROW is 500
@Task aborted if an error is detected in one of the further parts
-- There is 500 because length of NFPC_FILEROW is 500
-- SimpAcct <ns11:Id> pos 3-10
-- SimpAcct <ns11:Id> pos 19-26
-- SimpAcct <ns11:Ccy>
-- Dbtr <ns11:Id>
-- AmtDtls
-- OpSgn
-- Name details <Dbtr>Nm
-- Payment reference <Dbtr>MemoFldLn
-- Descriptions: Name details (<ns11:Dbtr><ns11:Id>) and Payment reference (<ns11:MemoFld><ns11:MemoFldLn>) must be stored as
separate lines to NFPC (max 4 lines possible in XML)
-- Update IBAN only if NFPA_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR contains only 0-9 (numeric) and is 26 long
-- Validate value date

ExpSyntax.val: 'Payment'&' '&Trim (Str ({0,3},'9'))&' '&'The value date is outside of range from'&' '&DStr ({0,14},'DD.MM.YYYY')&' '&'to'&' '&DStr ({0,15},'DD.MM.YYYY')

Text.val: -- In case of retry form online program, reduce error counter if statement is
now handled without errors
